ESRS 1 chapter 7 preparation and presentation of sustainability information
Question ID 552 – Comparative information
Release date
May 2024
Question asked
Does the company need to report data from previous years?
ESRS reference
ESRS 1 chapters 7.1, 10.3 and 6.3
Key terms
Comparative information; base year
Background
